content:
Eira is a great character, and her journey is a big part of what makes "Sword and Star" so compelling. It's wonderful that you're invested in her story and want to see how she's grown and overcome the challenges she faced.

It's interesting that you mention Eira's tough times, as character development is a crucial aspect of any good story. Seeing characters face difficulties and emerge stronger or changed because of them is incredibly satisfying. I'm sure you'll be eager to hear how Eira has coped with her struggles and what new challenges she's encountered.

Since you're getting back into the podcast, you might want to prepare yourself for some emotional moments. Eira's journey is not without its emotional ups and downs, and the podcast's storytelling can be quite evocative. Make sure you have some tissues handy and are in a comfortable, distraction-free environment to fully immerse yourself in the story.

Are there any specific aspects of Eira's character or her journey that you're particularly interested in seeing develop or explored further? For example, her relationships, her magic abilities, or her role in the larger world of the podcast?
